text:
The statement from Microsoft is only valid if the recovery partition sits on the
right of the main operating system partition.
You don't resize the existing partition when it's on the left of the C: drive,
you create a new one, don't remove the old one and move WinRE.wim to the new
partition.
https://p0w3rsh3ll.wordpress.com/2024/01/13/0x80070643-error_install_failure-part-1/

Microsoft should only say: "You need a recovery partition with minimum 250MB of
free space"

metadata.subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Feedback to Microsoft
